title: Fort Union National Monument: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management        2014 Naturalization ceremony at Fort Union National Monument. Superintendent shaking hands. Volunteer Richard Gonzales       Our Partners  Fort Union National Monument's Partners and Affiliated Organizations.      Laws & Policies Information on: Fort Union National Monument's Enabling Legislation Superintendent's Compendium Code of Federal Regulations for Parks, Forests and Public Property Unmanned Aircraft Policy The Archaeological Resources Protection Act of 1979 (ARPA) Firearms in Parks Policies New Mexico Department of Public Safety Information Guidelines for Living History and Black Powder Demonstrations .      Park Planning Planning documents which include: 2014 Fort Union National Monument Foundation Plan Fort Union National Monument Administrative History Fort Union National Monument Ethnographic Overview and Assessment Fort Union National Monument Exhibit Concept Plan - A Conceptual Plan for the Development of Museum Exhibits
